00164         static void threadBase(Runner* _runner, NetCache* _cache, unsigned _cur_thread_no, boost::barrier* _barrier)
00165         {
00166             RunDirection dir = _runner->getDirection();
00167 
00168             unsigned layer;
00169             (dir == ForwardRun) ?  (layer = 0) : (layer = _cache->data.size() - 2);
00170 
00171             do {
00172                 //Process current layer
00173                 NetCache::ThreadTaskType* task = &_cache->data[layer][_cur_thread_no];
00174                 for(unsigned i = 0; i < task->size(); ++i)
00175                     _runner->run( (*task)[i] );
00176 
00177                 //Wait for other threads
00178                 _barrier->wait();
00179             } while( (dir == ForwardRun && ++layer < _cache->data.size() - 1) || (dir == BackwardRun && layer-- > 0) );
00180             /*
00181              * A little comment.
00182              * Cache structure:
00183              * Layer1:   thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00184              * Layer2:   thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00185              * ...
00186              * LayerN-1: thread1_data, thread2_data, ...
00187              * LayerN:          <= last layer. ALWAYS empty! (see Net::regenerateCache())
00188              * cache.size() == N+1;
00189              * thread_data is vector of Neuron*
00190              */
00191         };
00192 
00193         /* Serialization */
00194     private:
00195         friend class boost::serialization::access;
00196         template<class Archive>
00197             void serialize(Archive & ar, const unsigned int version)
00198             {
00199                 ar & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_BASE_OBJECT_NVP(Object)
00200                  & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(lastNeuronId)
00201                  & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(threadCount)
00202                  & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(biasId)
00203                  & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(neurons)
00204                  & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(inputNeurons)
00205                  & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(cache)
00206                  & BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NVP(learningHint);
00207             };
00208     };
